algorithm_technique: Iterating through all possible starting points and summing energy with k-jumps.
Optimized iteration by considering only k starting points.
problem_summary_simple: Find the maximum energy by starting at any magician and jumping k steps forward.
problem_summary_technical: Iterates through k possible starting points, summing energy along k-step intervals to find the maximum cumulative energy.
key_insights: The problem can be broken down into k independent sequences based on the starting point modulo k.
For each sequence, we can calculate the maximum sum of a contiguous subsegment that starts at the beginning of the sequence.
The overall maximum is the maximum of these maximums across all k sequences.
